data.title: 15 California communities to receive drought funding amid extreme conditions
data.excerpt: As part of ongoing efforts to help small communities address water supply challenges amid extreme drought and build water resilience for the future, the Department of Water Resources announced its eighth round of funding through the Small Community Drought Relief Program.
data.author: Anna Opalka
